about.title: About Sakura Sushi
about.subtitle: Bringing authentic Japanese sushi experience to Blagoevgrad since 2020. Fresh ingredients, traditional techniques, and a passion for excellence.
about.storyParagraph1: Sakura Sushi was born from a deep appreciation for Japanese culinary art and a desire to share authentic sushi with the community of Blagoevgrad. Founded by chefs trained in traditional Japanese techniques, we combine time-honored methods with the freshest ingredients to create an exceptional dining experience.
about.storyParagraph2: Our name, Sakura (cherry blossom), symbolizes beauty, renewal, and the fleeting perfection we strive for in every piece of sushi. Just as cherry blossoms are appreciated for their brief but stunning bloom, we believe each dish should be a moment of perfection to be savored.
about.storyParagraph3: Today, we're proud to serve the community with restaurant-quality sushi at our cozy restaurant, making authentic Japanese cuisine accessible to everyone in Blagoevgrad.
about.freshDailyDesc: We source the freshest fish and ingredients daily, ensuring premium quality and authentic taste in every roll.
about.madeWithPassionDesc: Every roll is handcrafted by skilled sushi chefs who take pride in their work and love for Japanese cuisine.
about.traditionalTechniquesDesc: Our chefs are trained in authentic Japanese sushi-making methods, from rice preparation to knife skills.
about.qualityFirstDesc: We never compromise on quality. From premium nori to perfectly seasoned rice, excellence is our standard.
about.dineInExperienceDesc: Enjoy restaurant-quality sushi at our cozy restaurant in Blagoevgrad.
about.communityFocusedDesc: We're proud to be part of the Blagoevgrad community and committed to serving our neighbors with excellence.
about.freshnessGuaranteedDesc: All ingredients are sourced daily and sushi is prepared fresh to order. We never use pre-made rolls.
about.safeHygienicDesc: Our kitchen follows strict food safety standards and all staff are trained in proper food handling protocols.
about.authenticRecipesDesc: Traditional Japanese sushi prepared with authentic techniques and high-quality ingredients imported from Japan.
about.customerSatisfactionDesc: Your happiness is our priority. Not satisfied? We'll make it right.
about.teamDescription: Behind every great roll is a team of passionate professionals dedicated to bringing you the best sushi experience in Blagoevgrad.
about.founderDescription: Visionary behind Sakura Sushi, bringing authentic Japanese culinary traditions to Blagoevgrad with passion and dedication.
about.chefDescription: Master of Japanese cuisine with years of experience crafting exquisite sushi and traditional dishes using the finest ingredients.
about.ctaDescription: Join thousands of satisfied customers and taste the difference that authentic Japanese sushi makes.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question or special request? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.phoneDescription: Call us for orders, questions, or reservations
contact.emailDescription: Send us an email and we'll respond within 24 hours
contact.locationDescription: Visit us in the heart of Blagoevgrad
contact.lastOrderNote: Last orders accepted 30 minutes before closing
contact.readyToOrderDescription: Browse our menu and make a reservation or order for takeaway
contact.faqReservationA: Yes! Call us at 087 679 5204 to make a reservation. We recommend reservations for groups of 4 or more.
contact.faqPaymentQ: What payment methods do you accept?
contact.faqPaymentA: We accept all major credit and debit cards through our secure Stripe payment system.
contact.faqModifyOrderQ: Can I modify my order after placing it?
contact.faqModifyOrderA: Please call us immediately at 087 679 5204 if you need to make changes. We'll do our best to accommodate!
contact.faqCateringA: Yes! Contact us by phone or email to discuss catering options for your special event.
contact.followUsDescription: Stay updated with our latest dishes, special offers, and news
contact.needAssistanceDescription: For urgent order issues or inquiries, call us directly:
contact.orderByPhoneDesc: Call us for quick and convenient ordering
contact.orderByEmailDesc: Send us your order and we will contact you
